sentences.en: A walrus is even doing push - ups and sit - ups with the trainer.
sentences.cn: 一只海象也在根训练员一起做 俯卧撑 和仰卧起坐.

sentences.en: Did the wretched witch watch a walrus washing?
sentences.cn: 可怜的巫婆看海象洗衣服 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is the queer old duck with the knee - length gaiters and walrus mustache.
sentences.cn: 他穿着高及膝盖的皮护腿,留着海象般的八字胡,真是个古怪的老家伙.

sentences.en: It is the Elephant and Walrus Kingdoms that greet you today.
sentences.cn: 今天是大象和海象王国向你们问候.

sentences.en: JM Barrie was a big guy with a walrus moustache.
sentences.cn: JMBarrie是个留山羊胡的大家伙.

sentences.en: Mammals such as whales and walrus in turn feed on this small prey.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物如鲸鱼,海象反过来捕食这些小猎物.

sentences.en: Morse was yet another name that appeared before walrus and seems to have spread to other languages only to drop out of use in English.
sentences.cn: 莫尔斯是另一个在海象流传以前就存在的名称，并且似乎已经传播到其他语言而唯独在英语中退出了。

sentences.en: Seals much like Walrus live along the shorelines of land and sea.
sentences.cn: 海豹就像海象一样,生活在陆地与海洋交界的海岸线上.

sentences.en: The old walrus turned her head slowly and opened her eyes.
sentences.cn: 那只老海象慢慢地转过头来,睁开了眼睛.

sentences.en: The shape of Walrus evolved out of the Manatee species.
sentences.cn: 海象的外形是从海牛物种里演化而成.

sentences.en: The walrus snorted suddenly and loudly.
sentences.cn: 老海象突然大声地喷着鼻息.

sentences.en: The wretched witch watched a walrus washing.
sentences.cn: 可怜的巫婆看海象洗衣服.

sentences.en: Walrus ivory was a particularly essential material, used to make knives.
sentences.cn: 海象牙则是制作刀具必不可少的材料.

sentences.en: Walrus mothers are extremely nurturing, constantly hugging and nuzzling their babies.
sentences.cn: 海象妈妈非常体贴, 时不时地拥抱或爱抚它们的宝贝.

sentences.en: Walrus populations were in serious decline during centuries of wholesale slaughter for their blubber and tusks.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来,为获取海象脂和獠牙,人们成批捕杀海象,使海象数量严重减少.

trans.tran_en: a large sea animal with two long tusks(= things like teeth ) coming down from the sides of its mouth
